name: Traveler
message: Hey, in name of lady Liana, Im here to hear about your problems

name: Drunken
message: Hey, who are you? I dont know you, and you dont know anything about this city and its problems

name: Drunken
message: Taxes... thats what I have to tell you, we are rotting in here, and the taxes are too high

name: Drunken
message: This is no way of living, the royal family is just taking our money and we are not getting anything in return

name: Drunken
message: We work all day... I just want to drunk all day, but even the taverns are too expensive

name: Traveler
message: Okay, If you say so... I will tell lady Liana about this

name: Drunken
message: Thank you, I hope you can do something about this
